text: "Gimme the Loot" is a song by Russian rap artist Egor Rakitin, professionally known as Big Baby Tape, from his debut studio album Dragonborn. The song uses a sample from The Notorious B.I.G. song of the same title. ==Viral popularity== The song was viral by phrase "я взял твою бу" (en. I took your boo). ==Commercial performance== The song reached number one on VKontakte, and Apple Music in Russia, and on the American hip hop site Genius. ==Track listing== ==Notes== ==References== Category:2018 singles Category:2018 songs
title: Gimme the Loot (song)
